name: 大數據分析理論與實務
description: This course aims to train students to learn the theoretical methods and tools of big data analysis to engineering and management problems. The content covers the basic concepts and data preparation of data mining, the method and evidence of data mining, and the advanced application of data mining; so that students can easily apply data mining methods, thereby improving the ability of big data analysis and digital decision making.
goals: 學會問題解決的基本演算法
syllabus:
Week 1.Introduction

Week 2.Input: concepts, instances, attributes

Week 3.Output: Knowledge representation

Week 4.Algorithms: the basic methods (1)

Week 5.Algorithms: the basic methods (2)

Week 6.Credibility: Evaluating what’s been learned

Week 7.Trees and rules (1)

Week 8.Trees and rules (2)

Week 9.Examination

Week 10.Extending instance-based and linear models

Week 11.Data transformations

Week 12.Ensemble Learning

Week 13.Weka introduction

Week 14.Deep learning

Week 15.Beyond supervised and unsupervised learning

Week 16.Moving on: Applications and Beyond

Week 17.Final Report Presentation (1)

Week 18.Final Report Presentation (2)

methodologies.note: 透過課程介紹各類大數據分析方法與分析工具
透過課堂討論深化理論與實務之了解
透過作業實際操作大數據之分析軟體與平台
